aboutMe.text: I’m Abhishek, a 25 year old designer with a frontend development background. I’ve always been intrigued by user experiences, and how to make them better and more intuitive. This led me to start learning UI design, and identify common problems in everyday UI. Currently, I work as a developer at PiktorLabs, where I bring to life some amazing interfaces both on web and mobile.

landingPage.paraOne: I’m Abhishek, a developer / designer based out of Bangalore, India. Currently, I work as a Product Engineer at Piktorlabs.
landingPage.paraTwo: I enjoy contributing to user experience and research and that's where I look to improve my skills. I also enjoy creating interfaces, as well as bringing them to life, on web, android and iOS.
landingPage.title: I'm Abhishek

letsTalk.paragraph: Are any of these thoughts on your mind right now? Then you have come to the right place! Drop me an email, or hmu on any of my social profiles, and let’s create something exciting!
quotes: I want someone to build this website for me.
Wow this Abhishek dude has a website, let me see what he’s done
Wow, what a clean website. How did you make this?
I want to hire you as my new UX designer and pay you a ridiculous amount of cash.
